import { Grid } from '@mui/material' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import '../styles/NewRoutine.css' const NewRoutine = ({ API_URL, onShow, routine, setRoutine, microcycles, setMicrocycles, sessionsDay, setSessionsDay }) => { const [emptyMicrocycle, setEmptyMicrocycle] = useState( { number: 1 } ) const emptySession = useState( { day: 'Martes', microcycleId: 0 } ) const addSession = (microcycle) => { let empty = emptySession empty.microcycleId = microcycle setSessionsDay([ ...sessionsDay, ...empty ]) } const addMicrocycle = () => { let empty = emptyMicrocycle empty.number = microcycles.length + 1 setMicrocycles([ ...microcycles, ...empty ]) } const handleSession = (key, value, index) => { let updated = sessionsDay updated[index][key] = value setSessionsDay([ ...sessionsDay, ...updated ]) } useEffect(() => { console.log(emptyMicrocycle.number) console.log(microcycles) console.log(sessionsDay) }, [routine, microcycles, sessionsDay]) return (
{microcycles.map((microcycle, index) => (
Microciclo {microcycle.number}
{sessionsDay.filter((sessionDay) => sessionDay.microcycleId === microcycle.number) .map((session, index) => (
)) }
))}
) } export default NewRoutine
